# 1997 Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation

The 1997 Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation () was held in January 1998. It is part of the Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation series held in Hong Kong.
Top 10 song awards
The top 10 songs (十大勁歌金曲) of 1997 are as follows.
